articles.title: Donald Trump threatens new 50% tariffs on China - BBC
articles.description: The US president said he will introduce the extra tariff unless China withdraws its own 34% counter-tariff on American goods.
articles.content:
Emma Haslett
Donald Trump has threatened China with an extra tariff of 50% on goods imported into the US if it does not withdraw a countermeasure it announced on Friday.
In a post on his social med… [+1749 chars]

articles.author: Gene Park
articles.title: Nintendo boss Doug Bowser explains the $80 price for ‘Mario Kart World’ - The Washington Post
articles.description: In an interview with The Post, Nintendo of America president Doug Bowser explains the company’s approach to pricing its new games.
articles.content: Shortly before President Donald Trumps far-reaching tariffs stunned the global economy, gamers were fixated on another number: Nintendo announced the Switch 2s marquee title Mario Kart World would co… [+6275 chars]
